keys: trading in large amounts of coins for smaller amounts
Handeln in den großen Mengen Münzen für etwas

commerce de grandes quantités de pièces de monnaie pour un 
peu

negociar em quantidades grandes de moedas para quantidades 
menores

commerciando nei grandi importi delle monete con più piccoli 
importi

εμπορικές συναλλαγές στα μεγάλα ποσά νομισμάτων για τα μικρότερα
ποσά

el negociar en cantidades grandes de monedas para cantidades 
más pequeñas

          <title>
            <string language="nl">Scottie Nickels Change Maker</string>
          </title>
          <language>nl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Work as sort of a human Coinstar machine, taking many coins and returning fewer coins of the same value. You need to have JavaScript enabled in your browser.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">coins</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">trading in large amounts of coins for smaller amounts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Travel well</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">universal</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="en">Travelwell</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="en">eQNet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">counting coins</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">counting money</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <aggregationLevel>
            <source>aggregationLevelValues</source>
            <value>4</value>
          </aggregationLevel>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Arbeit als Sortierung einer menschlichen Coinstar Maschine, 
viele Münzen nehmend und bringen wenige Münzen des gleichen Wertes 
zurück. Sie müssen das Javascript haben, das in Ihrer 
Datenbanksuchroutine aktiviert wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Travail comme tri d'une machine humaine de Coinstar, prenant 
beaucoup de pièces et renvoyant peu de pièces de la même 
valeur. Vous devez avoir le Javascript permis dans votre navigateur.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Trabalho como a sorte de uma máquina humana de Coinstar, 
fazendo exame de muitas moedas e retornando poucas moedas do mesmo 
valor. Você necessita ter o Javascript permitido em seu browser.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lavoro come ordinamento di una macchina umana di Coinstar, 
prendente molte monete e restituente poche monete dello stesso valore.
Dovete avere Javascript permesso in vostro browser.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εργασία ως είδος μιας ανθρώπινης μηχανής Coinstar, που παίρνει
πολλά νομίσματα και που επιστρέφει λιγότερα νομίσματα της ίδιας 
αξίας. Πρέπει να επιτρέψετε JavaScript στον ξεφυλλιστή σας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Trabajo como clase de una máquina humana de Coinstar, tomando
mucha moneda y volviendo poca moneda del mismo valor. Usted 
necesita tener Javascript permitido en su browser.</string>
          </description>
